channel.title: Comments on: Start of the Christmas Season in Utah

item.title: By: Juan Hernandez
item.dc:creator: Juan Hernandez
item.description: I consider my self a Christmas fan. When that November 1rst hits, We play Christmas songs in the house, put on the Christmas tree while at the same time bake Christmas coockies. But of couse I am not forgetting about Thanksgiving, I still cellebrate Thanksgining as well.
item.content:encoded: I consider my self a Christmas fan. When that November 1rst hits, We play Christmas songs in the house, put on the Christmas tree while at the same time bake Christmas coockies. But of couse I am not forgetting about Thanksgiving, I still cellebrate Thanksgining as well.
